Html:
The official Html Agility Pack package has been uploaded. You can see the information at http://nuget.org/Packages/Packages/Details/Html-Agility-Pack-1-4-0

There is an unofficial package that someone else uploaded, it has the default NuGet icon. I've asked for it to be removed.

Agreed, we should delete the other one.  Unfortunately, I'm hitting a strange glitch that's preventing me from deleting it.  I suspect that the fact that the name has spaces is triggering a bug in the web site.  Anyway, let's ignore it for now, and I'll try to find a way to delete it.

thanks!
David
